channel.title: Mg(11) on LS | Papermod
channel.description: Recent content in Mg(11) on LS | Papermod

item.title: The Unexpected Guest
item.description: Gaby has a birthday party, but one of the girls doesn't fit in. Daddy makes her welcome.

item.title: Kate Versus the Zombies, Part 1
item.description: I know what Loliwood needs--more zombies! This story is about the mid-point in a much larger tale I've had bouncing around my brain for a few years now; here, we are introduced to eleven-year-old Kate, a skilled zombie killer and--this will surprise you to learn--a nymphomaniac. Self-proclaimed 'dirtiest girl you've ever met.' This is part one of four parts.

item.title: Strangers Have the Best Candy
item.description: A story of a man, and some candy, seducing a flirty little eleven year old girl.

item.title: The Red Rooster
item.description: 'I marveled at her lithe little body, tall and oh so thin; she somehow managed to combine the carefree ease of childhood, the hesitating awkwardness of adolescence, and just a little hint of the graceful beauty of womanhood. A perfect filly, Ellie May was.' The hero, an unemployed lawyer in town to adjudicate the estate of a deceased relative, stumbles upon a small town's, and his relative's, dark secret. In the process he falls head-over-heels in love. And, I suppose it goes without saying, has lots of graphic sex with underage girls.
